Package org.opengrok.indexer.analysis

Class OGKTextVecField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.document.Field
      • org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.OGKTextVecField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.lucene.index.IndexableField
    public class OGKTextVecField
extends org.apache.lucene.document.Field
    Represents an OpenGrok-customized tokenized, text field with stored term vectors to centralize settings across all the analyzers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.lucene.document.Field
